data.text: Good morning to Vermont. But I hope Pope Benedict and those weird people waving nazi flags at a vaccine mandate protest in Canada have a horrible day.
As of now, Saskatchewan, Quebec, and other places ending vaccine proof and masking requirements, etc. When will Vermont?

THIS NEEDS A CORRECTION 

"Over 99% of people ages 12 and up in Vermont have received at least one dose of the Covid-19 vaccine," - VTDigger

I think this was just a mistake, but nonetheless, it should be corrected. Proponents/skeptics alike can agree that's not true.

#vtpoli

The highest vaccination rates in the US: Vermont leads the way at 80%, Rhode Island comes in a close second at 79%, with Maine, Connecticut & MA rounding out the top 5.
 
While they don't crack the top 10, the W. coast also has high vaccination rates from CA to WA state,
Couldn’t get into a restaurant in Vermont because I didn’t have proof of vaccination…I thought we lived in a free country AKA America….I guess not??
